Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Controller
public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
This class is the main class in the controller package. It is responsible for implementing the state machine that governs the game's logic. Game phase state : InitialSelection (0), MainLoop (1), EndGame (2), CalculateLeaderboard (3), Done (4) This class thus is responsible also for forwarding game actions to the corresponding controller and propagating their response, checking if an end game condition was met after a player has ended his turn and generating the end game leaderboard. This class also validates that the player that has requested an action to be made, is in fact the active player whose turn it is to play, using the turnController. If a different player from activePlayer has sent a request, the Controller throws a NotActivePlayerException

      private boolean isActivePlayer​(java.lang.String _nickname)
      Method to evaluate if a given nickname is associated to the active PlayerBoard.
      Parameters:
      _nickname - the nickname we are looking for.
      Returns:
      true if the PlayerBoard bound to _nickname is active, false otherwise.

    • advanceTurn

      public void advanceTurn​(java.lang.String _nickname) throws NotActivePlayerException
      Method to be called after a RequestEndTurn message has been received by the active player.
      Parameters:
      _nickname - the nickname of the player which sent the request.
      Throws:
      NotActivePlayerException - : thrown if a player who is not the active player has tried to end his turn.

    • checkPlayerEndGameConditions

      private boolean checkPlayerEndGameConditions()
      Private method to be called every time a player ends his turn. It checks if a player has reached one of the two win conditions.
      Returns:
      true if _player has achieved an end game condition, false otherwise

    • checkLorenzoEndGameConditions

      private boolean checkLorenzoEndGameConditions()
      Private method to be called every time a Lorenzo ends his turn. It checks if Lorenzo has reached one of the two win conditions.
      Returns:
      true if Lorenzo has achieved an end game condition, false otherwise

    • assignInitialBenefits

      public void assignInitialBenefits​(java.lang.String _nickname, java.util.ArrayList<CardLeader> _cardList, Resource _res1, Resource _res2) throws NotActivePlayerException
      Method to be called after a ResponseInitialSelection message has been received by the active player.
      Parameters:
      _nickname - The nickname of the player that has sent the response.
      _cardList - The list of selected CardLeaders. Must be _cardList.size() == 2.
      _res1 - If the player isn't eligible to obtain one bonus resource this field must be null, otherwise it must be an element of the Resource enum.
      _res2 - If the player isn't eligible to obtain a second bonus resource this field must be null, otherwise it must be an element of the Resource enum.
      Throws:
      NotActivePlayerException - : thrown if a player who is not the active player has tried to make this action.

    • buyAndPlaceDevCard

      public void buyAndPlaceDevCard​(java.lang.String _nickname, int _rowIndex, int _colIndex, int _placementIndex) throws InvalidCardDevelopmentPlacementException, InvalidSlotIndexException, NotEnoughResourcesException, FullSlotException, NotActivePlayerException
      Method to be called after a RequestBuyDevelopmentCard message has been received by the active player.
      Parameters:
      _nickname - The nickname of the player that has sent the request.
      _rowIndex - The row index of the desired card within the card market matrix.
      _colIndex - The column index of the desired card within the card market matrix.
      _placementIndex - The index of the selected slot in which to place the newly bought card.
      Throws:
      InvalidCardDevelopmentPlacementException - : thrown if the selected placement index would not consent for a legal placement.
      InvalidSlotIndexException - : thrown if an invalid index was selected as the placement index.
      NotEnoughResourcesException - : thrown if the player does not hold enough Resource s to buy the desired card.
      FullSlotException - : thrown if the slot at _placementIndex already holds 3 cards.
      NotActivePlayerException - : thrown if a player who is not the active player has tried to make this action.

    • useMarket

      public java.util.HashMap<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> useMarket​(java.lang.String _nickname, int _index, java.lang.String _selection) throws NotActivePlayerException, java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Method to be called after a RequestMarketUse message has been received.
      Parameters:
      _nickname - The nickname of the player that has sent the request.
      _index - The index of the selected line from which to retrieve the Marbles.
      _selection - Field must be either "row" or "column"
      Returns:
      null if no resources must be discarded after obtaining them from the market, an instance of HashMap containing the newly obtained resources if one or more resources must be discarded.
      Throws:
      NotActivePlayerException - : thrown if a player who is not the active player has tried to make this action.
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - : thrown if an invalid _index was selected by the player.

    • discardResources

      public java.util.HashMap<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> discardResources​(java.lang.String _nickname, java.util.HashMap<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> _discardSelection) throws NotActivePlayerException
      Method to be called after a ResponseDiscardResourceSelection message has been received.
      Parameters:
      _nickname - The nickname of the player that has sent the request.
      _discardSelection - An instance of HashMap containing the amounts to be discarded for each Resource
      Returns:
      null if _discardSelection allowed for the remaining resources to be added to the player's deposit, an instance of HashMap containing the previously obtained resources if the selection did not allow for the remaining resources to be added to the deposit.
      Throws:
      NotActivePlayerException - : thrown if a player who is not the active player has tried to make this action.

    • activateProductionPowers

      public void activateProductionPowers​(java.lang.String _nickname, ProductionSelection _selection) throws NotActivePlayerException, InvalidSlotIndexException, NotEnoughResourcesException, CardLeaderRequirementsNotMetException
      Method to be called after a RequestActivateProduction message has been received.
      Parameters:
      _nickname - The nickname of the player that has sent the request.
      _selection - An instance of ProductionSelection
      Throws:
      NotActivePlayerException - : thrown if a player who is not the active player has tried to make this action.
      InvalidSlotIndexException - : thrown if an invalid index for a CardDevelopmentSlot was selected in _selection
      NotEnoughResourcesException - : thrown if the player does not hold enough resources to activate all of the selected production powers.
      CardLeaderRequirementsNotMetException

    • activateLeaderCard

      public boolean activateLeaderCard​(java.lang.String _nickname, CardLeader _cardToBeActivated) throws NotActivePlayerException
      Method to be called after a RequestActivateCardLeader message has been received.
      Parameters:
      _nickname - The nickname of the player that has sent the request.
      _cardToBeActivated - The CardLeader, selected by the player, to be activated.
      Returns:
      true if the CardLeader was activated, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      NotActivePlayerException - : thrown if a player who is not the active player has tried to make this action.

    • calculateScores

      public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> calculateScores()
      Method to be called when gamePhase == 3.
      Returns:
      An instance of HashMap, mapping the player nicknames to their total victory points.

    • discardCardLeader

      public void discardCardLeader​(java.lang.String nickname, java.lang.Integer cardLeaderIndex) throws NotActivePlayerException
      Proxy method to call actionController.discardCardLeader.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player that wishes to discard one of his leader cards.
      cardLeaderIndex - index of the card to be discarded, within the cardLeader ArrayList.
      Throws:
      NotActivePlayerException
